TRANSMITTERâ€”EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
November 8, 1962
I would like to get a copy of ithe Supreme Court
decision of last Monday (Nov. 5) in which Justice
Goldberg upheld the New York District Court*s opinion
on "illegal block-booking" involved in selling television
films
I think the Center and the stations need to take a look
to see whether some of the directions we are headed
tfaight run us afoul this provision.
Do you suppose someone could make a copy of the opinion
available -- or will it be published in detail in either
BROADCASTING or TELEVISION DIGEST?
( RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
NOV 12 1962
